name: Dodge Arena
description:
Dodge monsters rushing towards you in the deadly Dodge Arena. Last as long as possible to unlock new characters and prove yourself to be the ultimate arena master.

HOW TO PLAY
-Click anywhere on the screen to move your character
-Don't get hit by the enemies coming your way
-Power ups appear in the form of a shield, potion and sphere. Collect them to give your character a minor advantage for a short duration
-Reach a certain high score to unlock new characters
